conclusion: Violation of Art. 8 (except for the first applicant);Violation of Art. 10 (except for the first applicant);Violation of Art. 11 (except for the first applicant);Violation of Art. 13 (all applicants);Non-pecuniary damage - financial awards;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
